typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Ethnicity_Code_Desc                 } as string,
		{Ethnicity_Code                 } as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SREthnicityCodes
SREthnicityCodes sink(input(
		EthnicityCode_KEY as integer,
		Ethnicity_Code as string,
		EthnicityCode_Desc as string,
		CreationDate as timestamp,
		UpdationDate as timestamp,
		RecordCreationUserID as integer,
		RecordUpdationUserID as integer,
		ph_varchar1 as string,
		ph_varchar2 as string,
		ph_Decimal1 as decimal(10,2),
		ph_Decimal2 as decimal(10,2),
		ph_datetime1 as timestamp,
		ph_datetime2 as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Ethnicity_Code = {Ethnicity_Code_Desc                 },
		EthnicityCode_Desc = {Ethnicity_Code                 }
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> TREthnicityCodes
